eng: a no is a no

Is she a nurse? — (Yes,) she is.
Are they at work? — No, they aren't.
Are they afraid? — (Yes,) they are. (No,) they aren't.

Is he surprised? — (), he is. (), he isn't.
Are you hungry? — (), I am. (), I'm not.
Is it true? — (), it is. (), it isn't.
Am I right? — (), you are. (), you aren't.
Got it?
